quote: You sleep okay, sweetie?” “Miss my teddy,” Billie replied. Personally, I thought Detective Mitch Lawson was far superior to a tiny pink teddy bear but I wasn’t six years old.
quote_letters: YOU SLEEP OKAY SWEETIE MISS MY TEDDY BILLIE REPLIED PERSONALLY I THOUGHT DETECTIVE MITCH LAWSON WAS FAR SUPERIOR TO A TINY PINK TEDDY BEAR BUT I WASNT SIX YEARS OLD

chat:
kidney - Organ that filters blood.
reptiles - Cold-blooded animals, such as snakes and lizards.
isotopes - Atoms with the same number of protons but different number of neutrons.
specially - Particularly, designed for a specific purpose.
two-way - Moving or allowing movement in two directions.
excited - Energetic or enthusiastic.
nassau - City in the Bahamas.
artworks - Creative pieces, such as paintings or sculptures.
supply - Provide something necessary or in demand.
hourly - Occurring every hour or paid on an hourly basis.
leader - Person who leads or commands a group.
embodied - Represented or manifested in bodily form.
yemeni - Relating to Yemen, a country in western Asia.
leftist - Supporting left-wing political views or policies.
authority - Power or right to enforce rules or make decisions.
wished - Desired or longed for.
melting - Changing from a solid to a liquid.
absorbed - Soaked up or taken in by something.
nativity - Birth or origin of something.
